pages.title: Small Clue
pages.text: In Dragonrot Swamps, the remains of gigantic creatures can be found. These blocks seem to be impossible to mine in the classical way, as they are protected by a magical aura. Is there an unconventional way to break this aura, maybe using great force?

pages.title: Concise Instructions
pages.text: Dragonbone Blocks can be damaged using powerful explosions. You will need something with quite a bit more explosion power than TNT, for example Incandescent Amalgam. Though you feel that strong magical explosions might have a similar effect, breaching their protective aura.
